location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No.938 (Political Department) from David Greenhill, Secretary to the Government to Colonel Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of a receipt of a previous letter relating to the Imam of Muscatâ€™s designs against Bushire. Greenhill writes that the Governor in Council is of the opinion that His Highness should be now left to pursue his own policy towards Bushire and that Stannus, as Resident, should remain neutral in the matter.
